name: Gold Rush (PlayPure)
description:
Gold Rush was developed in one day as part of a college lab. Assets and music used are credited in the "Credits" menu in the game. Since it was made in a day it's nothing amazing. I am only in my second year of Virtual reality and gaming course so any feedback is appreciated.

THE GAME WAS ALWAYS INTENDED TO BE FREE, IT'S JUST ON "SALE" AS I THOUGHT THAT THIS WAS I COULD GET MORE PEOPLE TO TRY IT! 

Thanks in advance :)
